document.full_text: a u.s. drone aircraft fired missiles at militants in pakistan on thursday, killing eight of them, pakistani officials said, as american officials vowed to press forward with such attacks after u.s. forces killed osama bin laden in his pakistani hideout.
document.title: u.s. intensifies drone aircraft attacks in pakistan
lines_and_colors: a u.s. drone aircraft fired missiles at militants in pakistan on thursday, killing eight of them, pakistani officials said, as american officials vowed to press forward with such attacks after u.s. forces killed osama bin laden in his pakistani hideout.
